name: bulls_and_cows_game
description: #A secret number is set randomly. #You Have to guess that number in given chances.  #The digits must be all different.  #For every chance it gives you the number of matches.  #If the matching digits are in their right positions, they are bulls,  #if they are in different positions, they are cows.  #Example: #-->Secret number: 5678  #-->Users entry: 8652 #-->Answer: 1 bull and 2 cows. (The bull is "6", the cows are "5" and "8".)
author: naveen kumar vadla
